channel.title: Desolution 317 ~ 2 worlds and Grand-Exchange
channel.description:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/hwFqDCp.png[/img] Welcome to Desolution!
[url=http://www.desolution.org/]http://www.desolution.org/[/url]
We focus on both good gameplay and a good community.
Some of our features:
- Auto vote - Auto donate - Online Website Highscores - 100 percent g.e. custom interfaces - 2 Worlds! Easy pk and Eco - Fair economy - 22 fully working skills! - Farming with herbs! - 8 bosses - Mage book with teleports, custom interfaces! - Corporal Beast drops chaotics and Nex armours! - 110 percent working party room - Sweet staff - Marketplace with spreaded shops, no line-ups! - Dicing (Donation needed to host) - Tons of different pickable display icons! (Donator only) - Custom loyalty titles! (Donator +) - Free stat resetting! - 2$ to change your account name! - Custom Donator store with custom points! - Polypore staff! - Aspicious Katana! - Dragon Kiteshield! - Dragonbone Mage and Melee sets! - ALL chaotics and primals! Even warhammers and daggers! - Extreme potions! - Custom vote shop! - Pk artifacts! - Rewarding gameplay! - Fair xp rates! - And ALOT more
[img]http://img802.imageshack.us/img802/2488/tvzq.png[/img] [img]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/7677/umbz.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/zaK5FFB.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/O3dZagq.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/OiiLpTF.png[/img]
Come take a look! [url=http://www.desolution.org/]http://www.desolution.org/[/url]

item.title: Desolution 317 ~ 2 worlds and Grand-Exchange
item.dc:creator: @eclipse_rsps eclipse rsps
item.description:
@eclipse_rsps wrote:

This is a horrible advertisement, posting pictures of your shops and teleports does absolutely nothing for you. Post pictures of your content that will make people actually want to play your server.

Read full topic

item.description:
@pumpklins wrote:

hwFqDCp.png728Ã—90

Welcome to Desolution!

http://www.desolution.org/

We focus on both good gameplay and a good community.

Some of our features:

  • Auto vote
  • Auto donate
  • Online Website Highscores
  • 100 percent g.e. custom interfaces
  • 2 Worlds! Easy pk and Eco
  • Fair economy
  • 22 fully working skills!
  • Farming with herbs!
  • 8 bosses
  • Mage book with teleports, custom interfaces!
  • Corporal Beast drops chaotics and Nex armours!
  • 110 percent working party room
  • Sweet staff
  • Marketplace with spreaded shops, no line-ups!
  • Dicing (Donation needed to host)
  • Tons of different pickable display icons! (Donator only)
  • Custom loyalty titles! (Donator +)
  • Free stat resetting!
  • 2$ to change your account name!
  • Custom Donator store with custom points!
  • Polypore staff!
  • Aspicious Katana!
  • Dragon Kiteshield!
  • Dragonbone Mage and Melee sets!
  • ALL chaotics and primals! Even warhammers and daggers!
  • Extreme potions!
  • Custom vote shop!
  • Pk artifacts!
  • Rewarding gameplay!
  • Fair xp rates!
  • And ALOT more





Come take a look!
